room_title: Escape room "Hollywood Heist" by Ready-Set-Escape in Smithfield
review: So much fun! You have to give Hollywood Heist a try! Especially if you love movies!

room_title: Escape room "Hollywood Heist" by Ready-Set-Escape in Smithfield
review: So. Much. Fun. The Hollywood Heist room is carefully designed with tons of movie references and props. The puzzles are challenging enough to make you work together but not too hard to take away from the fun. The owner and game masters could not be more kind. I highly recommend taking a group here!

room_title: Escape room "Hollywood Heist" by Ready-Set-Escape in Smithfield
review: We had the best time here! It was our first experience with an escape room. We started with the Pirate room and loved it so much we did the Hollywood Movie room next!
